Project¶

class oct.Project¶

Bases: object

A projecting object for appending inter-aline projections

Methods

Initialize self.

appendBScanProjection(image, frameType, data)

Appends a projected b-scan to the designated projection according to frame type :param image: b-scan to be projected :type image: nd.array :param frameType: Designates the image frame type (ie.

populateProjections(processer)

Populates a “projections” dictionary according to the processedData types that are present :param processer: reconstruction object that holds the processed images :type processer: object

populateTypes(processer)

Manages which projections types will be performed :param processer: reconstruction object that holds the processed images :type processer: object

Projects b - scan according to projection type ( ie.
